meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points having the same temperature.
meanings.sent1: The isotherms on the map show areas with the same temperature.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use isotherms to understand temperature patterns across regions.
meanings.sent3: The isotherms on the map decided where the picnic would be perfect.
meanings.sent4: The isotherms acted like colorful threads stitching the temperature zones together.
meanings.sent5: As you follow the isotherms, you travel through zones of equal warmth.

meanings.definition: A line on a graph representing a constant temperature.
meanings.sent1: The isotherms on the graph help visualize temperature consistency.
meanings.sent2: The isotherms in the graph indicate stable temperature levels.
meanings.sent3: The isotherms on the graph threw a party for the steady temperatures.
meanings.sent4: The isotherms in the graph are like a ruler measuring the heat.
meanings.sent5: The isotherms on the graph paint a clear picture of unchanging temperatures.
